body_html:
Please keep in mind that the TensorFlow GitHub Issues page is for tracking bugs and feature requests. It is not a way to escalate a Stack Overflow support question that is not getting enough attention. Thanks!

That said, if you are using Cuda 8, try switching to Cuda 9. The latest versions of TensorFlow do not supoprt Cuda 8, unless installing from source.

body:
Please keep in mind that the TensorFlow GitHub Issues page is for tracking bugs and feature requests. It is not a way to escalate a Stack Overflow support question that is not getting enough attention. Thanks!

That said, if you are using Cuda 8, try switching to Cuda 9. The latest versions of TensorFlow do not supoprt Cuda 8, unless installing from source.
